title: Customer one signs up and logs in Snapshot

view.title: Customer one signs up and logs in
view.subtitle: Primary customer account created.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

requestBody.title: Validate compliance and credential controls API Trace
Validate explicit UC need #3 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #3 API Trace

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.
